**Vape Train English Toffee**

**DISCLAIMER: These are my personal notes that I am sharing with the community & all palates are different.**

**SETUP:** Wasp RDA 4x28G 40G Fused Clapton 3mm 0.3 Ohms 45 Watts

**Testing Info:** Steeped 14 days, Tested freshly mixed and after 14 days Mixed 4% 70/30

**VT Description:**  "A super sweet English toffee flavour thatâ€™s ideal for many e-liquid recipes that sweet toffee flavour. At low percentages this would make an ideal sweetener for desserts, bakery based recipes. At higher percentages it can be widely used in candy style ejuice recipes. A definite must have flavour to bring sweetness to your recipes or simple mix as a single profile mix and enjoy on its own." They suggest mixed 2-4% solo 5-10%.

**Notes:** When I tested it freshly mixed it had a bit of chemical note too it, but after 14 days it has steeped out. It's a pretty straight forward flavor. The main note is a fairly sweet toffee with some creaminess. Wasn't much throat hit or harshness to speak of. The creaminess gave it a smooth decent bodied mouthfeel. 

**Pairings** Bakeries, cream, tobacco, & candies. Could be used at a low percentage along side of VT Toffee Ice Cream to boost the overall toffee note.
